title: Analyzing Request
description: Identifying your destination, travel dates, and interests. Checking for availability and local weather conditions during your planned dates.

title: Route Planning
description: Evaluating flight, train, and road options to find the most efficient connection from your origin. balancing travel time against cost and comfort.

title: Accommodation Search
description: Scanning for highly-rated hotels and stays that match your preference profile. Looking for central locations with good amenities and safety ratings.

title: Itinerary Construction
description: Drafting a day-by-day schedule. Selecting key attractions, allocating time for sightseeing, and identifying logical routes to minimize travel time between spots.

title: Curating Experiences
description: Adding local food recommendations, cultural experiences, and hidden gems. refining the plan to ensure a relaxed yet engaging pace.

title: Final Review
description: Verifying opening hours, checking logistics, and formatting the final travel plan with maps and tips.
